about_the_game:
Venture deep into the woods surrounding the outskirts of Loveland Ohio to find... your missing fast food order (of course it got lost again)!

In this short but sweet 2d puzzle platformer play as a character inspired by the famous cryptid: The Loveland Frog.

Traverse simple yet perplexing obstacles, swing across platforms, collect flies, and leap over gaps while admiring the magical aesthetic designed by our team here at Alcove Devs (unofficial).

Will you uncover all three endings? And who is this princess person really?!

Loveland's Leap was originally produced for Godot Wild Jam #70. After that initial (very broken) release, we continued working until it was ready to share with the world. We only gave ourselves a summer to create this game, but we hope you fall in love with the beautiful sprites, atmospheric music, and hand-painted watercolor backgrounds just like we did.

We invite you to play for free, as well as learn from, explore, and even modify the code at our linked GitHub repository, since all our code is open source!

short_description: Leap into the forest in this 2d puzzle platformer! Swing through the woods, find flies, and solve simple brain teasers. Let the trees envelope you as the water colored backgrounds and kalimba themed music create an unforgettable story book like atmosphere.
